mapper.insert: INSERT into USERTABLE (openid,微信名,性别,城市,省份,国家,头像) values (#{openId},#{nickName},#{gender},#{city},#{province},#{country},#{avatarUrl})
mapper.update: UPDATE USERTABLE set 员工编码=#{userId} , 密码=#{password} where openid=#{openId}
mapper.select: select 员工编码 as staffCode, 密码 as pwd, 微信名 as nickName, 性别 as gender, 城市 as city, 省份 as province, 国家 as country, 头像 as avatarUrl from USERTABLE where openId=#{openId}

SELECT rr.id, rd.`姓名` as staffName, rr.staffCode, rr.timeLength, rr.ReadingFeeling, rr.num, rr.praise, rr.praiseNum, rr.fabulous, rr.fabulousNum, rr.enshrine, rr.enshrineNum, rr.actualReading, uu.`微信名` as nickName, uu.`头像` as avatarUrl from reading_plancontent rr LEFT JOIN usertable uu ON rr.staffCode=uu.`员工编码` LEFT JOIN datacenter_personnel rd ON rr.staffCode=rd.`人员编码` WHERE rr.clockDate=curdate() AND rr.ReadingFeeling!=''
